name: Collect Coins, Delay Destruction
description:
Collect as many coins as possible, while rewinding the countdown on the bomb.

Rewind the timer by holding "Interact" while player is at bomb.

Movement: WASD keys

Interact: E

Current Highscore:

5310 by BobbyK

Asset Packs Used:

CanariPack 8BIT TopDown by Canari Games

2D Pixel Art Female Adventurer Sprites by Elthan

Kenny Game Assets 1 by Kenny

GamePixes Font by heaven castro

Additional Sounds from Soundsnap

Engine used:

Godot 3.2
